metadata.Title: CVE-2021-0936 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description: In acc_read of f_accessory.c, there is a possible memory corruption due to a use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-173789633References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux-aws-5.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
